message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1500000. I understand its importance to you and I am eager to make this opportunity available. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a price of $1200000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the significant value this product can bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Looking forward to your positive response.
